name: Pistil Jest Sport Cap - Women's
description: For bad hair days, uncomplicated days, or training days, this quick drying cap shields eyes and keeps it classy. UPF 50+ sun protection keeps you covered.Polyester and spandex fabric dries quickly.Mesh side panels vent excess heat.Paneled construction provides a close fit that does the trick for running or hiking.Adjustable back closure fits most heads.
